thread.title: Marek Brylewski for Ryszard Brylewski
thread.title_full: KISA Phone reviewed by Marek Brylewski for Ryszard Brylewski

author: Marek Brylewski for Ryszard Brylewski
title: Marek Brylewski for Ryszard Brylewski
text: The phone was purchased for my father as it is simple and easy to use, not like the complicated smart phones of today. The whole process of providing our requirement to receiving it was a simple and easy process, thanks.
